text:
@thehill @Rachel_McRea That's right Kemp, the coronavirus is afraid to go to gyms, bowling alleys, barbers, nail care...shit....WTF is a body art studio?  

Sounds like Georgia has many ways to get pretty. I hope your vanity doesn't get you killed.
